title: All the Backlist! December 13, 2019
description:
This week, Patricia talks about a couple great comics from her backlist to help you reach your year-end reading goal!
This episode is sponsored by the Read Harder Challenge.
Subscribe to All the Books! using RSS, Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or Stitcher and never miss a beat book.
Sign up for the weekly New Books! newsletter for even more new book news.
This content contains affiliate links. When you buy through these links, we may earn an affiliate commission.

Books discussed on the show:
Bingo Love: Jackpot Edition by Tee Franklin, Jenn St-Onge, Joy San, & more
The Unbeatable Squirrel Girl Vol. 1: Squirrel Power by Ryan North, Erica Henderson, & Rico Renzi
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
